Auckland surgeon Philip Polkinghorne sentenced to community work for meth charges following murder acquittal https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/auckland-surgeon-philip-polkinghorne-sentenced-to-community-work-for-meth-charges-following-murder-aquittal/ZGRYYCUSKVFOBK7LBFYF32ELY4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/auckland-surgeon-philip-polkinghorne-sentenced-to-community-work-for-meth-charges-following-murder-aquittal/ZGRYYCUSKVFOBK7LBFYF32ELY4/ Craig KapitanJudge: There was no evidence at trial suggesting Pauline Hanna purchased or used meth. He was acquitted in September of allegations he murdered wife Pauline Hanna.
